selectionPrompt: Pick only stories with a clear 'what changed' (policy passed, law signed, company action, casualty figures updated, verdict delivered) from credible sources. Prefer hard numbers and primary documents. Skip unverified or speculative reports.
essencePrompt: Return 3 bullets: 1) What happened (one sentence, new info), 2) Why it matters and to whom, 3) Evidence (numbers/dates/names) + one uncertainty if relevant. 60–120 words total.
perspectivesPrompt: Three one‑sentence views: 1) Immediate impact on stakeholders, 2) What could change next (specific trigger), 3) One practical implication for readers.
